messages.title: Jo Swinson says STOP BREXIT. FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content:
A FAIRER BRITAIN: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership delivering fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment.
INVEST IN SCHOOLS & OUR NHS: We will invest part of the £50 billion Remain Dividend for our schools and put £1 in income tax for our NHS and social care.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
The Liberal Democrats will take urgent action needed to protect our environment.
We will invest part of the £50 billion Remain Dividend for our schools and put £1 in income tax for our NHS and social care.
End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we already have and stay in Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS WILL STOP BREXIT

issues.brexitEurope:
STOP BREXIT
End the Brexit mess and keep the best deal we already have and stay in Europe.
